name: Energy Drones
description:
Hello, guys!

It's my first jam and game (actually demo :)) fully made by myself :)

You are the drone who should help last people and turn on a generator at end of the level.

**Controlls**

Use AD for the move, 

Space for jump, 

Shift for accelerate, 

E for examining item and F for Interact,

1 or 2 to switch weapon.

Also, use a mouse for Attack.

P.S. Yes it pretty hardcore :)
